text: Amfreville-la-Campagne is a former commune in the Eure department in Normandy in northern France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Amfreville-Saint-Amand.Arrêté préfectoral 23 November 2015 ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Eure department ==References== Category:Former communes of Eure Category:Populated places disestablished in 2016
title: Amfreville-la-Campagne
